title: PWV Fund I Q2 Update (Virtual)
description: Hosted by Jennifer Tacheff, David Price & David Thyresson. This is a virtual event for both current and prospective PWV LPs. We'll cover: Fund Progress: Since our first close on May 28th, things have been busy! We'll catch you up. Investments & Pipeline: Updates on new investments (5) and upcoming opportunities. Strategic Priorities: Focus areas through end of year. Open Discussion. Why Attend: Stay informed on the most important fund updates. Share input and perspectives directly with the general partners. Align on strategy and next steps moving into the next quarter.
